document_data.name: Gate of Dragons
document_data.Location: The Gate of Dragons was located on the northern wall of the city within close proximity to [[al-Zalim River]].
document_data.Description: A pair of [[dragon]]s were artfully carved into the framework of the gate, giving the portal its name.
document_data.Inhabitants: A garrison of 200 soldiers was stationed at the Gate of Dragons, making the gate a fortress as much as it was an entryway into Muluk.
